SUBTITLE_HEADER: More than {{exp}} years of personal experience in web development and design, complemented by other related knowledge.

TEXT: , I am {{age}} years old and I live in Buenos Aires (CABA), Argentina.
I am a passionate Full-Stack web developer and designer, specialized in front-end.
TEXT_STRONG: Senior Technician in Web Design and Programming

EXPERIENCE_ITEMS.description: My main work consisted of developing centralized auditing functionalities for identifying intellectual property infringements of major companies across global marketplaces and e-commerce platforms. This platform was based on a Single Page Application (SPA) with React on the frontend and robust APIs using Node.js on the backend.
Work simulation consisting of a Web app for drivers showing events, utilizing Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind.
Work simulation consisting of a Web app for a service connecting pet caregivers with owners, utilizing React, Tailwind, and Redux.
Store for astrological readings, utilizing Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind.
Creation of a survey within the LimeSurvey application, utilizing HTML, CSS, and PHP.

WARNING_PROJECTS: Being deployed on free servers, it is likely that some projects will not work as they should
